channel.title: Statistics on Portfolio website of Renata Mariani
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on Portfolio website of Renata Mariani

item.title: Pay discrimination in Omega Group Plc.
item.description: Is there a relevant difference between female and male salaries? At the last board meeting of Omega Group Plc., the headquarters of a large multinational company, the issue was raised that women were being discriminated in the company, in the sense that the salaries were not the same for male and female executives. A quick analysis of a sample of 50 employees (of which 24 men and 26 women) revealed that the average salary for men was about 8,700 higher than for women.
